synopsis.text: Ultraman tells the story of Shinjiro Hayata, the son of Shin Hayata who was the original Ultraman. Years after Shin fought off an invasion of monsters as Ultraman, the threat seems to have faded. However, a new danger is rising, and Shinjiro discovers he has inherited special powers from his father. When Shinjiro is attacked by mysterious creatures, the original Ultraman returns to defeat them, revealing his true identity to his son for the first time. Shinjiro learns he possesses the "Ultraman Factor," giving him enhanced abilities. He decides to join the fight against the new threat emerging underground. Wearing a high-tech Ultraman suit, Shinjiro throws himself into battle alongside the original Ultraman, now unmasked as his father. Together, they take on the responsibility of becoming the new generation of heroes defending Earth against otherworldly creatures lurking in the darkness once more. As Shinjiro struggles to harness his newfound gifts, he wrestles with the burden of living up to his father's legacy and wonders how far he is willing to go to help save humanity from the looming alien menace.
synopsis.author: anthropic.claude-v2:1
